import React,{useEffect, useState} from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import './Home.css' // import { post } from '../../../backend/routes/createPost'; export default function Home() { const navigate=useNavigate(); const [data, setData] = useState([]); useEffect(()=>{ const token=localStorage.getItem("token") if(!token){ navigate('/signin') } fetch("http://localhost:4000/allposts", { headers:{ "Authorization":"Bearer "+localStorage.getItem("token") }, }).then(res=>res.json()) .then(result => setData(result)) .catch(err=>console.log(err)) },[]) const likepost=()=>{ fetch("http://localhost:4000/like", { method:'put', headers:{ 'Content-Type':'application/json', "Authorization":"Bearer "+localStorage.getItem("token") }, }) } return (
{data.map((post)=>{ return ( <>
{post.postedBy.name}
favorite favorite

person_add

per week â‚¹.
